name: Hecahands Ibel
text: If this card battles a monster, neither can be destroyed by that battle. You can only use each of the following effects of "Hecahands Ibel" once per turn. You can reveal this card in your hand; shuffle it into the Deck, then Special Summon 1 "Hecahands" monster from your Deck in Defense Position, except "Hecahands Ibel". If this card is sent to the GY: You can target 1 "Hecahands" monster in your GY, except "Hecahands Ibel"; Special Summon it.
